text: Yeeɠɛɠala ʋuulɔzita maazu felegɔi (62) a ɓena, zɔi gulɔi ziaai ma nii a kɛ é ɠɛ ga kundiɠii, naa ɠa za, nu nɔpɛ ge la maaloboga. Naa ʋolu kundiɠi ɠila ka ʋa ta ná-kɔɔɓɔgi, ti taa wolai ta ada ɲadegai ɠoloɠolo. Kɛlɛ kundiɠii naa ná-fai ɠa ɓe eɠɛ ziɛve ka li ga ani. Kɛlɛ eyɛsu é za, toɠa faa zuɠoloɠolo kɔɔi ɠɔ, eɠɛʋelei naa leveni la.
